q: same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. The Associated Press. All rights reserved. When I was six weeks pregnant, a doctor at a walk-in clinic prescribed me an antibiotic. It was a holiday, and I couldn't see my regular doctor. I had the prescription filled, and even though the doctor knew I was pregnant, the bottle ended up saying not to take it if pregnant. Naughty By Nature co-founder Vin Rock said that he was appreciative that such high profile personalities appreciated the hit-making group's longevity in the music business. They understood that we was celebrating 20-years in the game and they realized that entertainment, it's hard to be around for 20 years no matter what you do, Vin Rock told AllHipHop.com. . This won't be Michael Vick 's first return to Atlanta, of course. He scored the first two touchdowns of his comeback in a December 2009 rout of the Falcons at the Dome. I'll never forget this day, an emotional Michael Vick said after the game. "I'll never forget coming back to the city of Atlanta. I'll never forget arriving yesterday.
